session.objective: Review human feedback on PR #920, apply triage label, and merge the PR

tasks.details: Verified PR #920 status: OPEN, APPROVED by rjmurillo, all CI checks passing except pending Cursor Bugbot (non-required)
No unresolved review threads found. All feedback addressed.
triage:approved label already applied to PR #920
Enabled auto-merge with squash strategy and delete-branch option. Direct merge blocked by branch policy, auto-merge will complete when all branch protection requirements satisfied.

decisions.decision: Use auto-merge instead of direct merge
decisions.rationale: Direct merge blocked by branch policy. All required checks passing, but merge state shows BLOCKED. Auto-merge will complete merge once branch protection requirements fully satisfied.
alternatives: Use admin flag to force merge
risks: Auto-merge may delay completion if additional checks run

learnings.source: Branch protection policies can block direct merge even when all required checks pass. Auto-merge provides cleaner workflow for protected branches.
learnings.context: Merge-PR.ps1 script returned error about branch policy prohibiting merge, suggested --auto flag

prStatus.status: Auto-merge enabled with squash strategy and delete-branch
prStatus.blockers: None - awaiting branch protection requirements to be satisfied
prStatus.nextSteps: PR will merge automatically once all branch protection requirements met
